parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake line can cause a complete loss of brake fluid, leading to a loss of braking ability, which can increase the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: brake line rupture at the connection to the caliper.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The shortened brake pads can cause excessive wear on the plates and fracturing of the brake shoe holder, leading to reduced braking performance and increased risk of accidents.
The failure of the ABS can cause a loss of vehicle control, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
The failure of the seat belt retractor can cause the seat belt to seize or jam, preventing it from retracting properly, which can increase the risk of injury or death in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The seat belt does not retract
the seat belt retractor is jammed
the seat belt fails to return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The fracture of the rear suspension can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or near-misses, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The rear suspension suddenly fails or fractures
or unusual noises from the rear of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dashboard lights can cause difficulty in reading essential gauges and instruments, especially at night, which can lead to accidents or decreased vehicle control.
symptoms: No interior lights on the dashboard
gauges are not visible at night
difficulty reading essential instruments while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the ignition key can cause the vehicle to turn off unexpectedly, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle turns on and then turns off
the vehicle stays off for an extended period
the consumer has to wait for 4-30 minutes before retrying

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Unaddressed recall issues can lead to safety risks, as the vehicle may still have a defect that can cause accidents or injuries. In this case, the owner is unsure if the recall was addressed before they purchased the vehicle.
symptoms: potential safety risks due to unaddressed defects.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Clutch Failure with Consequent Damage to Fuel/Electrical System
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the clutch can cause damage to other critical systems, such as the fuel and electrical systems, leading to a loss of vehicle control, accidents, or even fires.
